Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-4802 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-13
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-4802 affecting package glibc for versions less than 2.38-13. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package glibc is earlier than 2.38-13, affected by CVE-2025-4802
